name: King's Castle
text: This spell allows you to switch places with an ally. When you cast this spell, choose a single ally within range. You teleport to your ally’s space while your ally teleports to your former space.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 法器
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh:
该法术允许你与任何一名盟友切换位置。当你施放该法术时，选择单一一名法术范围内的盟友。你会传送至盟友所在的位置，而你的盟友则会传送至你之前的位置。

Knight's Calling
